mapper.select: select ec.id, ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num, ec.price, es1.title as subjectFirst, es2.title as subjectSecond, et.name as teacherName from edu_course ec left join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id where ec.id = #{id} and ec.is_deleted = 0

select ec.id, ec.title, ec.cover, ec.lesson_num, ec.price, ec.buy_count, ec.view_count, ec.subject_id, ec.subject_parent_id, ecd.description, es1.title as subjectTitle, es2.title as subjectParentTitle, et.id as teacherId, et.name as teacherName, et.avatar as teacherAvatar, et.intro as teacherIntro from edu_course ec left join edu_subject es1 on ec.subject_parent_id = es1.id left join edu_subject es2 on ec.subject_id = es2.id left join edu_teacher et on ec.teacher_id = et.id left join edu_course_description ecd on ec.id = ecd.id where ec.id = #{id} and ec.is_deleted = 0
